medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain associated with vaginal discharge
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began two days prior, initially localized to bilateral lower quadrants, now diffuse and stabbing, painful with inspiration. Denies fevers and chills, reports nausea but denies vomiting. Normal stool reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Fibromyalgia, Arthritis, Past surgical history includes open appendectomy, C-section, and panniculectomy.
